pr_title: ENT-2584: Mechanism to determine if SCA can be enabled for a consumer

timeline.message:
ENT-2594: Mechanism to determine if SCA can be enabled for a consumer
 - Add a new endpoint GET /consumers/{consumer_uuid}/content_access
 - Add a new endpoint GET /owners/{owner_key}/content_access

timeline.bodyText: For these, we should follow the format we use in the other objects: ClassName [prop=value, prop2=value2, ...]
